did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, level 1, Shelf 20F.
did.abstract: The Alumni Records and Materials Collection contains alumnae lists, alumnae budget books, official records, correspondence, and other information about the Alumnae Association of Radford College, Radford State Teachers College, and Radford State Normal School from 1919-1963. See the full extent of this collection by viewing the online finding aid.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Alumnae Records and Materials, Radford University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University, Radford, VA. Alumni Records and Materials , Accession # RU 4.4.1, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: These records were saved and filed by Dean of Students M'Ledge Moffett.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processsing and finding aid by Amanda Altice with finding aid assistance by Gene Hyde.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The Radford University Office of Alumni Relations works to sustain and expand loyalty between the university and alumni to help keep alumni of Radford University connected for life.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records, documents, and correspondence of the Alumnae Association of Radford College, Radford State Teachers College, and Radford State Normal School. This seven box collection includes alumnae lists, alumnae budget books, official records, correspondence, and alumni grandchildren records with photographs and scrapbook pieces of or about alumnae of Radford College from 1919-1963.

blockquote.p: Box 7 - Alumnae Grand Children Records w/Photographs and Scrapbook Pieces
